title: looking to sell 96 graded t205's lowered to $3,200 great deal will take offers.
author: benderbroeth

posts.post_title: looking to sell 96 graded t205's lowered to $3,200 great deal will take offers.
posts.post_content:
Will be entertaining offers for my t205 collection, scans available would rather sell as a lot.

here are my t205's

Scans of the major stars and short prints coming later today
Now taking offers please send email address for scans
I will do $2800 for the entire lot.  Don Hontz
Ed  I received the T205 lot today  thanks for the great service and extra cards  that was very nice of you    Don
